data.name: Starstruck
data.detailed_description:
Starstruck is a music adventure game where you rampage as a gigantic human hand ðŸ‘Œ

Explore the miniature diorama world of Starstruck through three distinct, intertwined adventures. As you play the game, you'll advance the story through two different modes of gameplay:

Two children in a miniature town


Step inside the diorama world and perform musical numbers as Edwin or Dawn, two troubled children whose stories are intrinsically tied to the fate of their town and the future of the planet.

Lend a helping hand


Go on a rampage as a gigantic human hand, seeking out the hidden evils within the town and destroying anything that gets in your way.

Save the world


Through these two gameplay modes, it will be your quest to take the roles of these characters and restore the planet back to its rightful state.

Features

  • Explore three distinct, intertwined adventures set in a model diorama world
  • Solve puzzles by switching between three playable characters' stories
  • Rhythm-based gameplay that combines multiple rhythm game mechanics
  • Hectic action puzzle gameplay where you play as a gigantic human hand
  • Customize the size, shape, and skin color of the hand to your liking
  • Original soundtrack by acclaimed composer Andrew Allanson
  • Soundtrack features live instrumentals and vocals performed by virtuosos from around the world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
